name: Yuru
description:
This is a video game made as part of the "Basics of Digital Game Development" (Osnove razvoja digitalnih igara) course at the Faculty of Electrical Engineering and Computing, Croatia.

The game is a short 2D platformer inspired by the likes of Celeste, Shovel Knight and Jump King. It features a short story and custom visual assets.

Controls: WASD, Spacebar

Development team:

Eva Bakrač

Filip Barbarić

Ana Marija Devčić

Nikola Glavak

Music and sounds:

https://teknoaxe.com/Home.php

https://www.zapsplat.com/
